welcome.welcomeFastySurvey:
Fasty-Survey is a technological solution focused on comprehensive survey management, developed with the main goal of optimizing data collection and analysis processes. This tool allows administrators to create customizable surveys, define dynamic question structures, and configure different types of responses based on the needs of the study.
It also facilitates the assignment of surveys to specific users, ensuring efficient and controlled distribution. Users can complete the surveys through an intuitive and responsive interface, significantly enhancing the user experience.
Once the data is collected, Fasty-Survey provides a results visualization system that enables users to clearly and attractively interpret the information through interactive charts and reports. This makes data analysis more accessible and valuable for strategic decision-making.

survey.saveReminder: Remember that after making any modification to the survey, you must click the "Save changes" button, otherwise, the modifications will not be preserved. Additionally, questions of type "Header" are not considered valid questions when saving.
survey.structurationReminder: In order to assign surveys after creating and editing them, they need to be structured first. Make sure to add at least one section using the "Structure Survey" option (gear icon).
survey.answersTip: Write it and press ENTER to enter your answer
survey.confirmDeleteSection: This section has assigned questions. Are you sure you want to delete it?
survey.surveyActivated: The survey has been successfully activated!
survey.surveyDeactivated: The survey has been successfully deactivated!
survey.duplicatedQuestion: There cannot be more than one question in the same section

user.name: Name
user.deleteRegister: Are you sure to delete this register?

validations.existingSection: A section with the same name already exists in this survey
validations.needOneSection: There must be at least one section
validations.notEmptySections: You cannot save the survey if it has empty sections
